description: The 76 places of worship are under scrutiny over possible Islamist extremism.
title: France launches checks on dozens of mosques
title_page: France launches checks on dozens of mosques - BBC News
maintext: In a note to regional security chiefs, reported by French media, Mr Darmanin said there would be special checks and surveillance for 76 mosques and prayer halls, 16 of them in the Paris region.
